divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my boss who also witnessed it and a coustomer going home for the day. Here evening it's dark at 10:30. Two objects were high in the sky a little east or my place moving in zigzag motion. One that was bright split off from the other and went straight out to space and gone. The other went across the sky west till out of sight.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Camrose
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: 2 lights appeared together, in formation one bright other not they split on travelled west the other zigzaged then disappeared
